biotools.summary: Tool for researchers concerned with target enrichment issues in next-generation sequencing. It evaluates the target enrichment performance of target regions given in BED format and outputs summary statistics, visualizations, and some additional files giving details on the analysis.

bioschemas.name: NGSrich
